extendedInfo.description: Download the official mobile app for the 2013 Hawaii International Film Festival presented by Halekulani. This year's dates are Oct. 10-20 on O'ahu, Oct. 24-27 on Kauai and Big Island. The festival features ~200 international films from 36 countries. Features include: - Browse the film guide which includes synopses, screening times/locations, photos, trailers, cast & crew, and more.- View the schedule of screenings organized by date and buy tickets to films. - Create your own personalized schedule of films you want to see.- Get updates to the program and schedule. The HIFF 2013 Fall Festival mobile app was created by FestPro, LLC, a provider of film festival management applications.

reviews.title: Pretty Cool. Nice Job.
reviews.comment: Decided to check if there was a HIFF app and was surprised to find one that just came out. Quite nice to see the full listing. Saving movies you want to watch is cool. You can buy tickets. Only thing I found missing was the lack of director, producer, etc details on listings. Still well done, nice Interface and quick browsing.
reviews.author: A Google User
